default: (a) {@item chain shirt|phb} and a {@item shield|phb} or (b) {@item leather armor|phb}
(a) two {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords} or (b) two {@filter simple melee weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon;melee weapon=sand}
(a) a {@item longbow|phb} and a {@item quiver|phb} of {@item arrows (20)|phb|20 arrows} or (b) a {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|phb} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|phb}

classFeature.name: Knacks
entries: 在荒野中，你学会了一些原始知识，被称为诀窍(Knacks)，可以增强你的狩猎、生存和追踪技能。在1级时，你可以从本职业末尾的列表中选择一个你喜欢的诀窍。

Whenever you gain a Ranger level, you can replace one Knack you know with a Knack of your choice, so long as you meet the prerequisites for that Knack. You cannot replace a Knack that is a prerequisite for another Knack you know.
At certain Ranger levels, you learn additional Knacks, as shown in the Knacks Known column of the Ranger table.

classFeature.name: Wild Expertise
entries: 你在穿越荒野方面的技能无与伦比。此外，在1级时，选择一个你熟练掌握的来自游侠职业技能列表中的技能。你在使用该技能进行的所有能力检定中，你的熟练加值翻倍。你还可以学习一门额外的语言，通常是你猎杀的生物或你保护的人民所使用的语言之一。
当你达到这个职业的第9级时，你可以选择另一个你在游侠职业技能列表中精通的技能来获得这个好处，以及另一种语言。（Ranger）

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 你的战斗技巧超过了大多数战士。在2级的时候，你获得了一种从以下列表中选择的战斗风格。你不能多次学习一种格斗术，即使有其他功能允许你学习另一种格斗术。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry
entries: 你集中注意力，像野生动物的捕猎者一样狩猎。此外，在2级时，你可以使用一个额外动作将你看到的一只生物标记为你的猎物，获得以下好处：

items: Whenever you damage it with an attack, you deal bonus damage equal to a roll of your Quarry Die, which is a {@dice d4}.
Whenever you make an ability check to track or locate it, you can add one roll of your Quarry Die to your {@dice d20} roll.

entries: 这些效益持续1小时，但如果你的猎物被杀死或者你将另一个生物标记为你的猎物，效益会提前结束。你可以使用这个特性的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少1次）。当你完成一次长休时，你会恢复所有已用次数。当你没有次数时，你可以消耗一个法术位再次使用这个特性。
当你达到6级、10级、14级和18级时，根据《游侠》表中的指示，游侠猎物的持续时间和猎物骰的大小都会增加。

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (8 hours)
entries: The duration of your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} has improved further.

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (24 hours)
entries: The duration of your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} has improved further.

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (1 week)
entries: The duration of your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} has improved further.

classFeature.name: Ranger's Quarry (Indefinite)
entries: The duration of your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} has improved further.

classFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: At 2nd level, you learn to draw upon the primal magic of the natural world to enhance your survival and combat skills:

entries.name: Preparing and Casting Spells
entries: The Ranger table above shows how many spell slots you have to cast spells. To cast a {@filter Ranger spell|spells|class=Alternate Ranger (LLAR)} of 1st-level or higher, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all of your expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.

At the end of each long rest, you prepare a list of spells that are available for you to cast. Choose a number of spells equal to your Wisdom modifier + half your Ranger level, rounded down. Spells must all be from the Ranger spell list at the end of this class, and be of a level for which you have spell slots.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Your power is drawn from an intuitive knowledge of nature, so Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for Ranger spells. You use Wisdom when a spell refers to your spellcasting ability, your Spell save DC, or when you make a spell attack roll.

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: You can use a {@item druidic focus|phb} as the spellcasting focus for your Ranger spells. See the Player's Handbook for example foci.

entries.name: Ritual Casting
entries: Your knowledge of the natural world allows you to draw out its innate magic. You can cast any Ranger spell that you have prepared as a ritual so long as that spell has the ritual tag.

classFeature.name: Ranger Conclave
entries: 在3级时，你可以从以下列表中选择一个兽穴，代表了你作为游侠的训练和技能：野兽大师(Beast Master)、猎人(Hunter)、破法者(Spellbreaker)或怪物猎手(Monster Slayer)。
你选择的游侠聚落将在3级时授予你特性，并在达到7级、11级和15级时再次授予你特性。
此外，每个游侠聚会都有一个聚会法术列表，一旦你达到聚会描述中注明的游侠等级，你就会始终准备好这些法术。 你的聚会法术算作游侠法术，但它们不会计入你每天可以准备的法术总数。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。与平常一样，你不能用这个功能将你的一项能力得分提高到20分以上。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack
entries: 从5级开始，每当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以攻击两次，而不是一次。

classFeature.name: Conclave Feature
entries: 在第7级时，你获得了由你的游侠（Ranger）（Conclave）赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。与平常一样，你不能用这个功能将你的一项能力得分提高到20分以上。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Wild Expertise
entries: 在第9级时，你选择另一个你精通的游侠职业技能来获得这个特性的好处，并学会说、读和写另一种你选择的语言。

classFeature.name: Tireless
entries: You are always ready for another hunt, never letting foes rest. Beginning at 11th level, you regain all of your expended uses of {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} whenever you finish a short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Conclave Feature
entries: 在11级时，你获得了由你的游侠圣域(Ranger Conclave)赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Conclave Feature
entries: 在15级时，你获得了由你的游侠（Ranger）专精赋予的特性。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: You hunt with the skills of an apex predator. At 5th level, you can't have disadvantage on attack rolls against your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}.
当你达到18级时，你在30英尺内对任何目标进行攻击骰时不会有劣势。

classFeature.name: Feral Senses
entries: 当你达到18级时，你在30英尺内对任何目标进行攻击骰时不会有劣势。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或将两项能力得分提高1分。与平常一样，你不能用这个功能将你的一项能力得分提高到20分以上。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Foe Slayer
entries: You are a Ranger of mythic skill, rivaling the great huntsmen of legend. At 20th level, whenever you hit your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} with a weapon attack, you can immediately end the mark and cause that attack to deal maximum damage instead of rolling. If the attack reduces the creature to 50 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against. your Spell save DC or instantly be reduced to 0 hit points.

activation.condition: Whenever you hit your Quarry with a weapon attack

subclass.name: Swarm Keeper
subclassFeatures: One with the Swarm|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Swarm Keeper|LLAR|15

subclassFeature.name: Beast Master
entries: In their role as guardians of nature, some Rangers form deep connections with the beasts of the wild. In recognition of this relationship, great spirits of the wild known as Primal Beasts will seek out such Rangers and form a primal bond. Together, Master and Beast stand together to defend the natural world.

subclassFeature.name: Beast Master Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Primal Beast
entries: You have formed a bond with a Primal Beast. You choose its stat block from one of the following options: the {@creature Beast of the Cave|LLAR}, {@creature Beast of the Land|LLAR|Land}, {@creature Beast of the Sea|LLAR|Sea}, or {@creature Beast of the Sky|LLAR|Sky}, each of which is detailed on the following page. The Primal Beast stat blocks use your proficiency bonus (PB) and Ranger Spell save DC.

Your Primal Beast is friendly to you and your allies, and it obeys your commands. In combat, it acts on your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the {@action Dodge} action unless you use a bonus action to order it to take an action from its stat block, or another action. Whenever you take the {@action Attack} action, you can forgo one attack to command your Beast to attack. When you are {@condition incapacitated}, your Beast can act on its own, and it uses its turns to defend both itself and you to the best of its abilities.
如果你的野兽生命值降至0点，它会像玩家角色一样进行死亡豁免投掷。如果野兽死亡，你可以进行一个特殊的1小时仪式，可以在短暂休息或长休息期间进行，将你的原始野兽复活，生命值为1点。作为这个仪式的一部分，野兽可以消耗生命骰来恢复额外的生命值。它还可以选择一个新的原始野兽属性块和外观。

entries.name: Primal Beasts & Animal Companions
entries: While Primal Beasts here are described as powerful nature spirits, they can take on any appearance you wish, so long as they resemble a beast of their size.
While some Primal Beasts appear as supernatural guardian spirits, others appear as normal animals. What sort of Primal Beast has your Ranger bonded?

subclassFeature.name: Wild Empathy
entries: You learn the {@optfeature Wild Insight I|LLAR} Knack, but it doesn't count against your Knacks Known. If you already know Wild Insight I, you learn another Knack.

subclassFeature.name: Bestial Focus
entries: You and your Beast hunt as one. Your {@subclassFeature Primal Beast|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Beast Master|LLAR|3} gains all benefits of your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2}, including any Knacks that enhance it, and its attacks count as magical for the sake of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Exceptional Training
entries: You are able to draw out the full ferocity of your Primal Beast. Once per turn when you command your {@subclassFeature Primal Beast|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Beast Master|LLAR|3} to use one of the attacks from its stat block, it can make two attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Primal Bond
entries: The bond with your Primal Beast has reached its apex. When you cast a Ranger spell that targets yourself, the {@subclassFeature Primal Beast|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Beast Master|LLAR|3} also gains the benefits as long as it is within 30 feet of you.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter
entries: Hunters hold the line between civilization and the wilderness using their deadly tracking and hunting skills. In the shadows of every countryside town lurks a Hunter, silently taking care of any monster that threatens the peace. Hordes of orcs, vile trolls, great and terrible dragons, or great beasts of the wild, it matters not. A Hunter will always overcome their quarry.

subclassFeature.name: Hunter Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

rows: {@spell mordenkainen's faithful hound||faithful hound}, {@spell freedom of movement}

subclassFeature.name: Ambuscade
entries: You are always prepared to strike first, often getting the jump on your chosen prey. When you roll initiative, so long as you are not {@quickref surprise||3||surprised}, you can use your reaction to take the {@action Hide} action, the {@action Attack} action, or mark a creature as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}.
如果你感到惊讶，你不能采取这个特殊反应，但是你可以在战斗的第一个回合表现正常。

activation.condition: When you roll initiative, so long as you are not surprised

subclassFeature.name: Silent Steps
entries: You stalk your prey unseen until it is too late. You learn the {@optfeature Stalker I|LLAR} Knack, but it does not count against your Knacks Known. If you know this Knack you learn another of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Parry
entries: Your unyielding focus allows you to parry and counter foe's attacks. When your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} targets you with an attack you can see, you can use your reaction to add your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1) to your Armor Class against that attack.
如果这使攻击未命中，你可以作为同一反应的一部分对你的猎物进行一次武器攻击。

activation.condition: When your Quarry targets you with an attack you can see

subclassFeature.name: Relentless Hunter
entries: You are relentless, stalking your chosen foes until they are all eradicated. When your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} is slain, you can mark another creature you can see as your Quarry (no action required) without expending a use of Ranger's Quarry or a spell slot.

activation.condition: When your Quarry is slain

subclassFeature.name: Horde Breaker
entries: 你能像割草一样轻松地剿灭你选择的猎物。你获得以下列出的特性，每个特性都可以在你的每个回合中用作一个动作。你必须装备正确的武器才能使用相应的特性：

subclassFeature.name: Volley
entries: 选择你可以看到的距离你所持远程武器的正常范围内的一个点。你可以对距离那个点不超过10英尺的生物进行远程武器攻击。你必须为每个目标准备弹药，并且必须像平常一样分别进行攻击骰投掷。

subclassFeature.name: Whirlwind
entries: 你对你所持的近战武器攻击任意数量的生物，每个生物都需要进行单独的攻击检定。

subclassFeature.name: Ruthless Focus
entries: Your deadly skills rival those of the great hunters of legend and myth. You add your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1) to all weapon attack rolls you make against your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}.

subclassFeature.name: Spellbreaker
entries: Spellbreakers are a small but dedicated Conclave of Rangers that specialize in hunting mages who use their arcane power for evil. While most pursue the life of a Spellbreaker for noble reasons, there are some who seek to destroy anyone with the potential to use magic. Most Spellbreakers work in secrecy, only striking when success is a certainty. If a wrong move could end in disintegration, there is no room for error.

entries.name: Arcane Spellbreaker
entries: Looking for a more dedicated mage hunter? Check out the {@class Magus|LLMC|Order of Spellbreakers|Spellbreaker|LLMC} for the {@loader Magus Class|class/LaserLlama; Magus Class.json}.
The Magus is an Intelligence-based, arcane half-caster that serves as the counterpart to the Ranger and Paladin. Hunt with mastery of spell & sword!

subclassFeature.name: Spellbreaker Spells
entries: You always have certain spells prepared at the Ranger levels in the table below. They count as Ranger spells for you, but they don't count against the spells you prepare.

rows: {@spell arcane eye}, {@spell otiluke's resilient sphere||resilient sphere}
{@spell dispel evil and good||dispel evil & good}, {@spell wall of force}

subclassFeature.name: Spellsight
entries: You have learned to see the arcane potential of creatures. When you mark a creature as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}, you instantly learn its spellcasting ability (if it has one) and the level of the highest level spell that it has the ability to cast.
如果你的猎物被占卜魔法隐藏，比如通过{@spell nondetection}法术，它看起来好像无法施放法术。

subclassFeature.name: Mage Breaker
entries: You ward your weapons with antimagic enchantments. When you hit your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} with a weapon attack, it has disadvantage on its subsequent Constitution saving throw to maintain {@condition concentration} on spells.
此外，每当你看到或听到一个在你的攻击范围内的生物试图施放一个法术时，你可以使用你的反应对其发动一次机会攻击。

foundrySystem.activation.condition: Whenever you see or hear a creature within your reach attempt to cast a spell

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Defense
entries: You can steel yourself to better resist the magics of your foes. Whenever your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} forces you to make a saving throw to resist a spell or another magical effect, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1).
此外，每当你的猎物让你进行豁免投掷以仅受到一半伤害的法术或魔法效果时，你在成功投掷时不受伤害，在失败投掷时只受到一半伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Spellbane
entries: You are an unparalleled hunter of mages. Whenever you hit your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} with a weapon attack, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to deal bonus force damage equal to one roll of your Quarry Die per level of the spell slot.
Also, whenever you cast {@spell counterspell} or {@spell dispel magic}, you can add a roll of your Quarry Die to the ability check.

activation.condition: Whenever you hit your Quarry with a weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Mantle of the Master
entries: Your Spellbreaker training has reached its pinnacle. You are resistant to damage from spells and all other magical effects so long as you are not {@condition unconscious} or {@condition incapacitated}.

subclassFeature.name: Reflect Spell
entries: 你的训练使你能够从魔网中释放法术。你可以随意施放{@spell absorb elements|xge}，就好像你以1级施放它一样。
在你施放吸收元素后，如果你下一次近战武器攻击的目标是你吸收法术的生物，你将把吸收元素的伤害视为其最大值。

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer
entries: Some Rangers are driven from civilized life by a deep hatred for monsters. Often victims of these terrible monsters in their youth, those that take up the mantle of Monster Slayer travel the world hunting for vile supernatural creatures that prey on innocent mortals and ruthlessly annihilate them. They track down vampires, evil fey, restless spirits, werewolves, and any other vile creature and destroy them without hesitation.

entries.subclassFeature: Knowledge of the Hunt|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Monster Slayer|LLAR|3

subclassFeature.name: Monster Slayer Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

rows: {@spell bane}, {@spell protection from evil and good||protection from evil & good}
{@spell dispel evil and good||dispel evil & good}, {@spell hold monster}

subclassFeature.name: Knowledge of the Hunt
entries: You have dedicated yourself to the destruction of creatures of darkness, and study their weaknesses. You gain proficiency in your choice of {@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Religion}.
作为一个奖励动作，你可以分析一个你能看到的距离30英尺内的生物，使用下面对应其生物类型的技能进行一次能力检定（DC等于10 + 其CR）：

rows: 异常生物, 龙类, 畸变体
野兽、元素生物、软泥怪、植物
天神, 仙灵, 邪恶生物, 不死生物

entries: On a successful check, you learn one of the following characteristics of your choice: its highest ability score, lowest ability score, its damage vulnerabilities, its damage resistances or immunities, its condition immunities, or another weakness it may have. If the characteristic you choose doesn't apply the DM reveals another characteristic to you.
If you analyze your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} with this feature you can add one roll of your Quarry Die to your ability check.

subclassFeature.name: Slayer's Cunning
entries: You are always prepared to hunt. You gain the {@optfeature Slayer I|LLAR} Knack, but it does not count against your total number of Knacks Known.
You can also use {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} once between each short or long rest without expending a use of it.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Focus
entries: You have trained your mind to better resist the supernatural assaults of your hated foes. Whenever your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} forces you to make an ability check or saving throw you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Quarry Die.

activation.condition: Whenever your Quarry forces you to make an ability check or saving throw

subclassFeature.name: Monster's Nemesis
entries: Your hatred for evil empowers your weapons. Your weapon attacks against your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} treat its damage immunities as resistances, and ignore any damage resistances it has.
此外，当你的猎物未能用攻击命中你，或者你成功通过它强迫你进行的豁免投掷时，你可以使用你的反应对它进行一次单次武器攻击。

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When your Quarry misses you with an attack or you succeed on a saving throw it forced you to make

subclassFeature.name: Ruthless Counter
entries: You do everything in your power to prevent the monsters you hunt from harming the innocent. When you see your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} attempt to cast a spell, teleport, or use another supernatural or magical ability from its stat block, you can make a single weapon attack against it as a reaction. On hit, your Quarry must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your Spell save DC, or its spell, teleport, or other ability is thwarted and fails to take effect.
When you use this feature and your attack hits, you can choose to instantly end the effects of Ranger's Quarry to cause the creature to automatically fail its Wisdom saving throw.

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When you see your Quarry attempt to cast a spell, teleport, or use another supernatural or magical ability from its stat block

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker
entries: Deep beneath the earth where the light of the sun is a dream, nameless things dwell in the deep shadow. The Rangers who stand against these unspeakable terrors of the darkness are known as Deep Stalkers. Though their skills were originally developed by denizens of the Underdark, Deep Stalkers can be found guarding anywhere darkness lies heavy on the land.

subclassFeature.name: Deep Stalker Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: You mimic the surprise tactics of the nameless creatures that dwell in the darkness. You gain a bonus to your initiative rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1), so long as you are not {@quickref surprise||3||surprised} or {@condition incapacitated}.
Also, when you take the {@action Attack} action during your first turn in combat, you can make one additional attack as part of that action. On hit, it deals bonus damage equal to your level.

activation.condition: When you take the Attack action during your first turn in combat

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Sight
entries: You have adapted to stalk your prey without light. You gain {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision from another feature, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Cloak of Shadows
entries: You have learned to conceal yourself even from the creatures native to the deep shadow. While you are in darkness, you are {@condition invisible} to creatures that rely on {@sense darkvision} to see you.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Mind
entries: 你已经训练自己的思维，以抵抗在你潜行的深处常见的心理攻击。你获得在感知豁免 throws 中的熟练加值。如果你已经熟练，你可以选择在智力或魅力豁免 throws 中获得熟练加值。

subclassFeature.name: Precise Strikes
entries: 在无情的黑暗中，每一次攻击都可能是生与死的分水岭。每回合一次，当你用武器攻击未命中时，你可以将你的猎物骰投掷结果加到你的攻击骰中，有可能将你的未命中变为命中。
此外，你的暗视能力得到了提升，可以让你看穿无论是魔法还是非魔法制造的黑暗。

activation.condition: Once per turn when you miss with a weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Counter
entries: 你可以操纵阴影来迷惑你的敌人。当你能看见的生物以攻击骰对准你时，你可以使用你的反应将自己笼罩在阴影中，并让其攻击骰获得(-)对其攻击骰的劣势。
如果这个反应导致攻击未命中，你可以作为同一反应的一部分对你的攻击者进行武器攻击。如果你在昏暗或黑暗中进行这次特殊攻击，你对攻击骰有优势。

activation.condition: When a creature you can see targets you with an attack roll

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warden
entries: Planar Wardens dedicate their lives to preserving the balance of the multiverse by defending their native plane of existence from otherworldly threats. Keeping watch over planar portals these esoteric warriors can draw on the power of the planes to destroy outsiders that would seek to invade their homes.

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warden Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

rows: {@spell alarm}, {@spell protection from evil and good||protection from evil & good}

subclassFeature.name: Extraplanar Senses
entries: 作为一个行动，你可以探测到距离你当前位面或位面之间传送门内最近的生物的确切距离和方向，距离不超过1英里，且未被遮蔽于占卜魔法之外。在这个行动中，你可以排除自己选择的目标。
使用此特性后，你必须完成一次短休或长休才能再次使用它。如果你没有使用次数，你可以消耗一个1级或更高级的法术位再次使用它。

subclassFeature.name: Planar Warrior
entries: You can augment your strikes with extraplanar energies. You can choose for the additional damage of {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} to be force damage in place of your weapon's damage type.
此外，您可以将任何不是出生于您当前存在平面的生物标记为您的猎物，而无需消耗游侠猎物的使用次数。例如，在您身处物质平面时，您可以使用此特性标记异常生物、天神、元素生物、精灵和恶魔作为您的猎物。

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Step
entries: You can briefly move between planes to disorient your foes. When you take the {@action Attack} action, you can teleport up to 10 feet before each attack to an unoccupied space you can see.
你使用这个特性传送的任何距离都计入你本回合的总移动距离。

activation.condition: When you take the Attack action

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Strikes
entries: Your ability to move between the planes has improved. If you use {@subclassFeature Ethereal Step|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Planar Warden|LLAR|7} and attack at least two different creatures with that action, you can make one additional attack as part of that {@action Attack} action against a third creature.
另外，当你使用以太步并进行攻击时，你可以选择让你的攻击造成力量伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Defense
entries: 你可以部分脱离当前位面，以抵御敌人的攻击。当你受到一次攻击或法术造成的伤害，且你能看见这个攻击时，你可以使用你的反应使自己对该攻击的伤害获得抗性，持续本回合。

activation.condition: When you take damage from an attack or spell that you can see

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: In your wild wanderings you have acquired the magic of the Feywild, and use it to augment your Ranger abilities. Whether you are the chosen warden of a Fey crossroads, the favored servant of an Archfey, or you pilfered your power in a fey wager, you now wield the whimsical and terrifying powers common to the Feywild.

subclassFeature.name: Fey Wanderer Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Beguiling Strikes
entries: You can weave the wild and disorienting magic of the Feywild into your strikes, distracting and taunting your foes. You can choose for the bonus damage of your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} feature to be psychic instead of your weapon's noraml damage type.
如果你用近战武器攻击对你的猎物造成精神伤害，它在你的下一个回合开始前对除了你以外的生物的所有攻击骰都有劣势。

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Mystique
entries: The magic of the Feywild has imbued you with a whimsical charm that makes others more likely to trust you, for good or ill. You gain proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Deception}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}.
每当你进行魅力检定时，你获得一个等于你的智力调整值的奖励（最低为+1）。

subclassFeature.name: Whimsical Ward
entries: Your familiarity with the abilities of the fey grants you increased defenses against their power. You have advantage on saving throws to resist being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

Also, when a creature you can see within 30 feet makes a saving throw to resist the charmed or frightened condition, you can use a reaction to force another creature you can see within 60 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failure, it is either {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} of you (your choice) for 1 minute. The creature can repeat this saving at the end of each of its turns, ending this effect on a successful save.

activation.condition: When a creature you can see within 30 feet makes a saving throw to resist the charmed or frightened condition

subclassFeature.name: Faerie Guardian
entries: 你可以请求来自仙境法庭的支援。你可以施放{@spell summon fey|tce}而不需要它的材料组件。
Also, once per long rest, when you cast summon fey, you can cast it so that it does not require {@status concentration}. When you do, its duration is reduced from 1 hour to 1 minute.

activation.condition: When you cast summon fey

subclassFeature.name: Mirthful Step
entries: You can teleport through the Fey realm. You can cast {@spell misty step} without expending a spell slot a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
当你施放迷雾步(Misty Step)时，你可以触碰一个愿意的生物，距离你5英尺，并将其与你一起传送。它会重新出现在离你重新出现的地方5英尺内的一个空位上。

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Keeper
entries: Swarm Keepers enter symbiotic relationships with swarms of tiny creatures. Most often surrounded by a swarm of rodents, insects, birds, or other small animals, these strange Rangers see themselves as guardians of the smallest lives. Dwelling in the deep woods or underground caves, Swarm Keepers build communities that work together for the good of the swarm.

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Keeper Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Symbiotic Swarm
entries: You have become an integral part of a swarm of vermin. You know the {@spell mage hand} cantrip, but when you cast mage hand, it manifests as part of your swarm which does your bidding.
此外，您可以在每个回合使用一个奖励动作来命令您的虫群以以下方式之一：

subclassFeature.name: Biting Assault
entries: 你选择的一个生物必须在30英尺内进行一次敏捷豁免检定，否则将受到等于你猎物骰子两次投掷结果的刺穿或毒药伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Harrying Horde
entries: 你选择的一个生物在30英尺内必须成功进行一次力量豁免才能不被移动，否则会被朝你选择的方向移动最多15英尺。大型及更大体型的生物在这次力量豁免检定中具有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Step
entries: 你可以选择一个方向，向前移动15英尺，而且不会引发机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Writhing Horde
entries: 你可以驱使你的虫群以不自然的方式携带你。你获得一个等同于你行走速度的攀爬速度，并且可以在陡峭表面和天花板上倒挂而无需进行能力检定。在这种攀爬方式下，你被你的虫群包围着。

Also, when you make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to {@action shove} or {@action grapple}, or to resist or end a {@condition grappled||grapple}, you can call on your swarm and add one roll of your Quarry Die to your roll.

activation.condition: Also, when you make a Strength (Athletics) check to shove or grapple, or to resist or end a grapple

subclassFeature.name: Greater Swarm
entries: Your swarm has grown vastly in both numbers and in power. Your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} has disadvantage on saving throws against your {@subclassFeature Symbiotic Swarm|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Swarm Keeper|LLAR|3} features. Your Symbiotic Swarm features also gain the following additional benefits:

entries.name: Biting Assault
entries: On a failed save, the creature is {@condition poisoned} until the start of your next turn in addition to the damage.

entries.name: Harrying Horde
entries: On a failed save, the creature is knocked {@condition prone} at the end of this forced movement.

entries.name: Swarm Step
entries: After you move, you also gain the benefits of {@quickref cover||3||half cover} until the beginning of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: One with the Swarm
entries: 你可以融入你的虫群来避开危险。当你受到一次你能看见的伤害时，你可以使用你的反应变成虫群的一部分，并使自己对这次伤害获得抗性。然后你和你的虫群会传送到你能看见的30英尺内的一个未被占据的空间。
你可以使用这个特殊反应的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休时，你会恢复所有已使用的次数。如果你没有使用次数了，你可以消耗一个1级或更高级的法术位再次使用这个特殊反应。

activation.condition: When you take damage from a source you can see

subclassFeature.name: Swarm Master
entries: 你已经与你的虫群融为一体，只需用心灵就能指挥它。你可以施放你的一项虫群守护者法术，无需消耗法术槽或使用正常的材料组件，而是依靠你的虫群来产生它。
一旦你使用这个功能以这种方式施放一个Swarm Keeper Spell，你必须在再次这样召唤你的虫群之前完成一个短暂或长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Drake Guard
entries: Sometimes wandering Rangers enter into the service of great dragons and are gifted a portion of their power. Undergoing an ancient ritual, they are bound to a Draconic Companion, a powerful scion of an elder dragon. Known as Drake Guards, these Rangers fight alongside their Companions as powerful draconic servants, and can eventually become dragon riders.

entries.name: Sword, Sorcery, and Dragons!
entries: Interested in playing a true dragon rider? Check out the {@class Magus|LLMC|Order of Scales|Dragon Knight|LLMC} for the {@loader Magus Class|class/LaserLlama; Magus Class.json}, the arcane half-caster companion to the Paladin and Ranger!

subclassFeature.name: Drake Guard Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Draconic Companion
entries: 你的灵魂已经与一只龙类伙伴绑定在一起。你可以从以下选项中选择它的本质：酸、冰、火、闪电或毒。它的本质会影响它鳞片的颜色，一旦选择后就无法更改。
Your Companion uses the {@creature Draconic Companion|LLAR} stat block on this page, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) and Ranger Spell save DC throughout. It cannot bear a rider.

Your Draconic Companion is friendly to you and your allies and it obeys your commands. In combat, it acts on your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the {@action Dodge} action on its turn unless you use a bonus action to order it to take an action from its stat block or another action. Also, whenever you take the attack action, you can forgo one of your attacks to command the Companion to attack. When you are incapacitated, your Companion acts on its own, and will to defend both itself and you to the best of its ability.
当你的同伴的生命值降至0点时，它会像玩家角色一样进行死亡豁免投掷。如果它死亡，你可以执行一个特殊的1小时仪式，可以在短暂休息或长休息期间进行，将其恢复到1点生命值。作为这个仪式的一部分，它可以消耗生命骰来恢复生命值。

subclassFeature.name: Wyrmsoul
entries: The magic that bonds you to your {@subclassFeature Draconic Companion|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Drake Guard|LLAR|3||Companion} has infused you with draconic power. You learn to speak, read, and write {@skill Draconic}, and when you cast a Ranger spell that deals acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage, you can cause it to deal the damage type of your Companion's Essence instead.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Companion
entries: As your power increases, so does that of your {@subclassFeature Draconic Companion|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Drake Guard|LLAR|3||Companion}. Your Companion becomes Medium in size, and can bear you as a rider so long as you are Medium or smaller. However, its flying speed is halved while you are riding it. You can also roll {@damage d6}s, in place of d4s, for the damage of its Claw attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Breath
entries: You and your {@subclassFeature Draconic Companion|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Drake Guard|LLAR|3||Companion} can directly channel the elemental power of its Essence. As an action, you, or your Companion, can exhale a 30-foot cone of elemental breath. Creatures in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your Ranger Spell save DC. Creatures take {@damage 8d6} Essence damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a success.
你和你的同伴可以使用这个特性的次数总和等于你的感知调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休后，你会恢复所有已使用的次数。当你没有使用次数时，你可以消耗一个3级或更高级的法术位再次使用这个特性。

subclassFeature.name: Mythic Companion
entries: Your bond with your {@subclassFeature Draconic Companion|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Drake Guard|LLAR|3||Companion} has unlocked its true power. As an action, your Companion can change its size, choosing to be Small, Medium, or Large. If it is Large in size, its flying speed is no longer halved while it bears you as its rider.

Also, once per turn when you command your Companion to attack, it can make two attacks instead of one. Finally, the damage of {@subclassFeature Elemental Breath|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Drake Guard|LLAR|11} increases to {@damage 10d6} damage.

subclassFeature.name: Bounty Hunter
entries: Bounty Hunters protect humanoids from their own kind. Trained to stalk the streets of cities, they track their prey through the dark alleyways and underbellies of any town. Trained to use complex combat techniques, these Rangers can confidently confront and subdue any humanoid who threatens peace.

entries.subclassFeature: Ear to the Ground|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Bounty Hunter|LLAR:E|3

subclassFeature.name: Dead or Alive
entries: When you make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to {@action grapple} or {@action shove} your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to the result. Also, being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your attack rolls with {@item net|phb|nets}.

activation.condition: When you make a Strength (Athletics) check to grapple or shove your Quarry

subclassFeature.name: Ear to the Ground
entries: 你的工作使你对文明底层有独特的了解。在一个定居点完成长休后，你在收集关于其联系人、派系或地下世界的信息时，所有的能力检定获得优势。

subclassFeature.name: Martial Exploits
entries: You have studied various martial exploits to better counter the humanoids you hunt. You gain the following features:

entries.name: Exploit Dice
entries: 赏金猎人利用表格显示你有多少利用骰来使用技能。要使用一个技能，你需要消耗一个利用骰，当你完成短暂休息或长休息时，你会恢复所有已消耗的利用骰。

entries.name: High Degree
entries: Your Ranger level limits the technicality of Exploits you are able to learn an use. This limit is reflected in the High Degree column of the Bounty Hunter Exploits table.

entries.name: Exploits
entries: You learn two {@filter Martial Exploits|optionalfeatures|feature type=ll:me} of your choice from those available to the {@class Alternate Fighter|LLAF}. You can only use one Exploit per ability check, attack, or saving throw.
When you gain a Ranger level, you can replace one Exploit you know with another Martial Exploit of your choice.

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: 如果一个Exploit需要生物进行豁免检定，那么豁免检定 DC 的计算方法如下：

entries.name: Multiclassing & Exploits
entries: Your martial skill depends partly on your combined levels in classes with Exploits, and partly on levels in each class. If you learn Exploits from more than one class, reference {@link Alternate Martial Multiclassing|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-NGUL51kfZCPlESxL1wq}.

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Technique
entries: Your martial skills are especially potent when used against your chosen foe. Once per turn, when you force your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} to make a saving throw to resist the effects of an Exploit, you can force it to make its saving throw with disadvantage.
You also learn to identify, read, and speak in {@language Thieves' Cant}.

activation.condition: Once per turn, when you force your Quarry to make a saving throw to resist the effects of an Exploit

subclassFeature.name: Unwavering
entries: You are a master of disabling foes. When your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} misses you with a melee attack, you can force it to make a Dexterity saving throw against your Exploit Save DC as a reaction. On a failure, it suffers one of the following effects of your choice:

items: 如果目标是大型或更小，你可以将其击倒。
You can automatically {@action grapple} it if you have a free hand.
你可以对其进行一次单次近战武器攻击。

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When your Quarry misses you with a melee attack

subclassFeature.name: Most Dangerous Game
entries: Your nearly supernatural instincts allow you to predict your enemy's attacks. Once per turn when you take damage from your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}, you can reduce the damage you would take by one roll of your Quarry Die.

activation.condition: Once per turn when you take damage from your Quarry

subclassFeature.name: Buccaneer
entries: Combining their survival skills, affinity for nature magic, and passion for the high seas, Buccaneers are Rangers who feel more at home on the water than on solid ground. Serving as sailors, pirates, marines, and privateers, they are often among the most valuable crew members on their vessel. What drove you to the sea? Were you pressed into service by a pirate king? Or, have you sworn to slay a sea monster?

subclassFeature.name: Buccaneer Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Sea Legs
entries: The time you have spent at sea grants you abilities that land-locked Rangers lack. You gain the benefits listed below:

items: You gain the {@optfeature Mariner|LLAF:E} Fighting Style. If you already have this Fighting Style you gain another Fighting Style of your choice from those available to the Ranger class.
You learn the {@optfeature Aquatic Adept|LLAR} Knack, but it doesn't count against your total Knacks Known. If you already know this Knack you learn another Knack of your choice.
Whenever you make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check that relies on your sense of sight, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Quarry Die.

activation.condition: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check that relies on your sense of sight

subclassFeature.name: Windswept Hide
entries: Your experience has granted you increased resistance to the dangers of the sea. You gain resistance to cold, lightning, and thunder damage. Whenever you make an ability check or saving throw to resist being knocked {@condition prone} or moved against your will, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to your roll.

activation.condition: Whenever you make an ability check or saving throw to resist being knocked prone or moved against your will

subclassFeature.name: Wrath of the Sea
entries: 无论你身在海上还是陆地上，你身上都带着高海的魔法。每个回合一次，当你用武器攻击命中一名生物时，你可以赋予这次打击水之魔法，迫使目标进行一次力量豁免检定，DC为你的法术豁免DC。未能通过检定的目标将受到等同于你猎物骰的伤害，并被击退10英尺，沿直线击退。

activation.condition: Once per turn when you hit a creature with a weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Watery Resilience
entries: 当你能看见的生物用攻击命中你时，你可以使用一次反应，暂时变成水状形态，减半你会受到的来自该攻击的伤害。
作为这个反应的一部分，你还可以移动多达10英尺，而不会引发机会攻击。

activation.condition: When a creature you can see hits you with an attack

subclassFeature.name: Shifter
entries: While all Rangers have a unique bond with the wilds, those who join the Conclave of Shifters take this bond to its extreme. Using the ancient and powerful magic of Druids, these Rangers are able to change their physical form and take on the shape of the beasts they defend. They use this primal power to stand as guardians of all wildlife and the natural world.

subclassFeature.name: Shifter Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Limited Wild Shape
entries: 你可以借助原始自然魔法，像德鲁伊一样变身成野兽。你获得了野兽变身的能力。作为你回合的奖励动作，你可以使用这个能力，变身成你曾经亲手接触过的任何野兽的形态。

Your Ranger level determines the maximum CR of the beasts that you can transform into, as shown in the table below. You must obey all the other rules for Wild Shape as they are detailed in Druid's {@classFeature Wild Shape|Druid||2} feature in the Player's Handbook. See the table below:

rows: 没有飞行或游泳速度 (No Flying or Swimming Speed)

entries: 你可以保持野兽形态长达一小时，之后你会恢复成正常形态。你可以在此之前使用一个奖励动作来恢复成正常形态，或者如果你失去意识、生命值降至0，或者死亡时也会恢复成正常形态。
一旦你使用了你的野性变身，你必须完成一次短休或长休才能再次使用它，除非你消耗一个1级或更高级的法术位来再次使用野性变身。

subclassFeature.name: Wild Empathy
entries: The nature magic you wield enables a bond with the beasts you defend. You learn the {@optfeature Wild Insight I|LLAR} Knack, but it does not count against your total number of Knacks Known. If you already know Wild Insight I, you instead learn another Knack of your choice that you meet the prerequisites for.

subclassFeature.name: Druidic Soul
entries: The primal power you channel grants you the abilities of a true Druid. You learn to speak {@language Druidic}, and you can use it to decode and leave hidden messages for other Druids. You also count as a Druid for the purposes of attuning to magic items.
Finally, your {@subclassFeature Limited Wild Shape|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Shifter|LLAR:E|3||Wild Shape} form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunities.

subclassFeature.name: Empowered Shapes
entries: You can infuse your {@subclassFeature Limited Wild Shape|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Shifter|LLAR:E|3||Wild Shape} transformation with primal magic. As part of the bonus action you use to Wild Shape, you can expend a spell slot of 1st-level or higher to exceed the normal CR limitations of Wild Shape. When you do so, you can transform into a beast with a CR equal to or lower than the level of the spell slot you expended to transform.
一旦你使用这个特性，你必须完成一次短休或长休，然后才能再次使用这种方式强化野性变身。
此外，您可以为您的野兽变身形态的攻击伤害骰投掷猎物骰，除非该形态的伤害骰更高。

activation.condition: As part of the bonus action you use to Wild Shape

subclassFeature.name: Thousand Forms
entries: You are so in tune with your abilities that you can transform your normal form in subtle ways at will. You can cast {@spell alter self} at will, targeting only yourself, without expending a spell slot.

subclassFeature.name: Wastelander
entries: While all Rangers have the skills to survive in the wilds, those known as Wastelanders are true masters of survival. Rugged wanderers, they have adapted to survive in the harshest lands imaginable; arid deserts, frozen tundra, great alpine heights, and magical wastelands. These survivalists combine a talent for illusion magic and protective gear to survive anywhere.

entries.name: Elemental Wastelands
entries: While most Wastelanders hail from the deserts of the material plane, it is not unheard of for them to come from the chaotic inner planes. Some call the elemental planes of air, earth, fire, and water home.

subclassFeature.name: Wastelander Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Wilderness Adept
entries: You are able to survive the most inhospitable environments. You learn one of the following Knacks of your choice: {@optfeature Alpine Adept|LLAR}, {@optfeature Aquatic Adept|LLAR}, {@optfeature Arctic Adept|LLAR:E}, {@optfeature Desert Adept|LLAR:E}, or {@optfeature Jungle Adept|LLAR:E}. You learn another at 7th, 11th, and 15th levels.
Starting at 7th level, you can choose {@optfeature Planar Adept|LLAR:E} as the Knack you learn from this feature. The Knacks you gain this way do not count against your number of Knacks Known.

subclassFeature.name: Wasteland Weaver
entries: You have mastered an ancient pattern of enhancing clothing, that enables a supernatural level of survivability. You gain proficiency with {@item weaver's tools|phb}, and you can add double your proficiency bonus to any check you make with these tools.
在每次长休结束时，你可以使用编织者工具来增强一套衣物或披风。当生物穿着这件增强过的服装时，它会获得以下好处：

items: It gains a bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in wasteland and wilds equal to one roll of your Quarry Die.
为了生存，它只需要四分之一的水。
It has advantage on saving throws to resist the effects of harsh environments and subsequent {@condition exhaustion} levels.

entries: During each long rest, you must spend 1 hour maintaining any garments you have enhanced or they lose these beneficial properties. You can maintain a number of garments equal to your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of 1 set of garments).

activation.condition: At the end of each long rest

subclassFeature.name: Rugged Resilience
entries: 你将你强化服装的神秘编织与幻术魔法融合。穿着你强化服装的生物可以使用一个奖励动作对自己施放{@spell invisibility}。
它可以这样做三次，但当最后一次使用耗尽时，该服装将失去任何有益的属性。当你在长休期间花时间维护你的增强服装时，你的增强服装会恢复这个特性的所有使用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Illusory Strikes
entries: You enhance your combat style with potent illusion magic. When you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can use a bonus action to create an Illusory Duplicate of yourself in an unoccupied space you can see within 30 feet. It makes one attack with a duplicate of your weapon, which deals force damage in place of your weapon's damage and disappears.

subclassFeature.name: Mirage Transposition
entries: You can use a bonus action to create your {@subclassFeature Illusory Strikes|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Wastelander|LLAR:E|11||Illusory Duplicate} even if you do not take the {@action Attack} action. When you conjure an Illusory Duplicate, you can instantly switch places with it.

subclassFeature.name: Grim Warden
entries: Sometimes it takes a monster to destroy a monster. Those who take up the mantle of Grim Warden undergo a sinister alchemical ritual, the Warden's Rite, which enhances their physical abilities. They sacrifice any chance they have at a normal life by mingling their blood with that of monsters, so they may gain unnatural power to destroy their foes.

entries.name: A Monster to Fight Monsters
entries: If you like the idea of a full class that uses sinister blood magic, check out the {@loader Alternate Blood Hunter|class/LaserLlama; Alternate Blood Hunter.json}

subclassFeature.name: Grim Warden Spells
entries: You always have certain spells prepared at Ranger levels indicated below. They count as Ranger spells for you, but don't count against the spells you prepare.

subclassFeature.name: Warden's Rite
entries: 你已经通过了典狱长仪式(Warden's Rite)，这是一个邪恶的炼金术仪式，它让你的血液充满了怪物的邪恶力量。你将以以下列出的方式发生变化，这些变化是无法逆转的：

items: You gain proficiency with {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} and in {@skill Religion}. Whenever you make a check with either of these, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to your result.
你在魔法效果中被视为人形生物和怪物。
你的生命值上限增加了3点，并且每次在这个职业中升级时再增加1点。

subclassFeature.name: Crimson Mark
entries: You can use your sinister blood magic to empower the mark on your foes. Whenever you mark a creature as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry}, you can make a blood sacrifice instead of expending a use of Ranger's Quarry. When you do, you reduce your current and maximum hit points by one roll of your Quarry Die.
通过这个特性对你最大生命值的任何减少，在你接下来的长休息结束时都会恢复。
在持续时间内，你可以选择让游侠猎物的额外伤害为死灵伤害。以这种方式造成的死灵伤害无视抗性，并将免疫视为抗性。
最后，当你以这种方式对你的猎物造成死灵伤害时，它在接下来的一分钟内无法恢复生命值。

activation.condition: Whenever you mark a creature as your Quarry

subclassFeature.name: Dark Augmentation
entries: 邪恶魔法增强了你的身体能力。你的行走速度增加了10英尺。此外，每当你进行力量、敏捷或体质属性检定时，你的检定获得一个奖励，数值等同于你的猎物骰的一个骰点。

subclassFeature.name: Greater Crimson Mark
entries: Powerful blood magic infuses all of your strikes. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can deal an additional {@dice 1d10} necrotic damage to it.

activation.condition: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Sinister Resilience
entries: The dark magic that flows in your blood grants you defenses against evil magicks. You gain resistance to necrotic damage, and when you reduce your hit points with {@subclassFeature Crimson Mark|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Grim Warden|LLAR:E|3}, you roll your Quarry Die twice and use the lower result.

subclassFeature.name: Sanguine Mastery
entries: The magic of your Warden's Rite manifests its full potential. You have advantage on saving throws to resist the {@condition frightened} condition, and you are always under the effects of {@spell protection from evil and good||protection from good & evil} while you are conscious.

subclassFeature.name: Nomad
entries: 无论是出生、偶然还是仪式，每个游牧民的思维都与被称为诺斯菲尔的神秘知识网络相连。这种灵能联系使得游牧民能够获取来自遥远地方和不同生命的知识。这些奇怪的流浪者一生都在收集隐藏的传说，以补充连接每个游牧民的信息网络。
Drawing on this network, these Rangers can use psionic abilities to slip through cracks in reality, assault the minds of their foes, and draw on the knowledge of other Nomads.

entries.name: Optional Rule: Psionic Spellcasting
entries: For mechanics to match the fantasy of a psionic Ranger, replace all Ranger and Nomad Conclave features that use Wisdom with Intelligence.

subclassFeature.name: Nomad Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Expunging Strikes
entries: You can imbue your strikes with the psionic power of the noosphere to disrupt your foe's mind. Once per turn when you hit your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} with a weapon attack, you can force it to make an Intelligence saving throw against your Ranger Spell save DC. On a failure, all damage dealt by your attack becomes psychic damage, and your Quarry can't see, hear, or sense you in any way until the start of your next turn.

activation.condition: Once per turn when you hit your Quarry with a weapon attack

subclassFeature.name: Mystic Knowledge
entries: 你可以利用与(诺斯菲尔)连接，从过去和现在的(游牧民族)那里获取知识。每次你完成一次长休，你可以选择获得一个技能或工具的熟练加值，或学会说、读、写一种语言。你会保留这种语言或技能熟练加值的知识，直到你进行下一次长休为止。
在这个职业的11级起，根据这个特性，在完成一次长休后，你可以选择获得两种熟练项或语言，遵循以下规则。

subclassFeature.name: Nomad's Step
entries: 你可以暂时将你的意识与诺斯菲尔融合在一起，以避免伤害并以奇特的方式在世界中移动。你获得以下两个特性。你可以使用这些特性的次数总和等于你的智力调整值（最少为1次），当你完成一次长休后，你恢复所有已用次数。

subclassFeature.name: Phase Defense
entries: 当你被一个你能看到的攻击击中时，你可以使用一次反应，消失进入（诺斯费尔）(Noosphere)，使得那次攻击未命中。然后你会立刻重新出现在你在上一个回合开始以来曾经占据过的一个空位上。

activation.condition: When you are hit by an attack you can see

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Jaunt
entries: 作为一个奖励动作，你可以消耗你剩余的移动距离中的任意数量，立即传送相同距离的英尺数，重新出现在你能看到的范围内的一个空位。

subclassFeature.name: Strange Movement
entries: Your connection to the Noosphere has grown. You regain all uses of {@subclassFeature Nomad's Step|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Nomad|LLAR:E|7} when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Mystical Burst
entries: 当从诺斯弗回归时，你可以利用残留的神秘力量攻击你的敌人。当你使用游牧法术或游牧特性传送时，你可以迫使所有在你出现点周围10英尺范围内的生物进行一次智力豁免，豁免 DC 为你的法术豁免 DC。在豁免失败时，它们受到等同于你猎物骰的一次伤害，成功豁免时伤害减半。

subclassFeature.name: Stargazer
entries: Since ancient times, mortals have looked to the stars of night for stories of the past, omens for the present, and portents of the future. The Rangers known as Stargazers dedicate their lives to the study of stars and constellations, and can draw on their radiant power to conjure celestial magic, vanquish their foes, and twist the threads of fate for those around them.

subclassFeature.name: Constellation Magic
entries: You draw your power from the constellations of the night sky. Each time you finish a long rest, you attune yourself to one of the Constellations below. While attuned, you always have the corresponding Constellation spells, one cantrip and 1st-level spell, prepared. They become Ranger spells for you, but they don't count against the total number of spells you prepare. They also count as your Conclave Spells for 3rd level.

You can cast your 1st-level Constellation spell once without expending a spell slot, at the level of your highest level slot as shown on the Ranger table for your level, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Celestial Guidance
entries: The constellations of the night sky guide your steps. You gain proficiency in your choice of either {@item cartographer's tools|phb} or {@item navigator's tools|phb}. Also, whenever you make an ability check with either set of tools you add a roll of your Quarry Die to the result.
Finally, you can't become lost, even by magical means so long as you can see the stars of the night sky.

subclassFeature.name: Stargazer Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Threads of Fate
entries: You can use the insights you gain from the stars to twist fate. When a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an ability check or saving throw, you can use your reaction to add your Wisdom modifier (minimum of +1) to the result of its roll. You must use this reaction before you know if it succeeds or fails.
你可以使用这个反应的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休时，你恢复所有已用次数。

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an ability check or saving throw

subclassFeature.name: Starlight Strikes
entries: You infuse your weapons with the power of celestial starlight. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack or damage it with a Ranger spell, you deal additional radiant damage equal to one roll of your Quarry Die

activation.condition: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack or damage it with a Ranger spell

subclassFeature.name: Resplendent Soul
entries: 当你能看见的生物以你为目标发动攻击时，你可以使用一次反应向它释放一个有针对性的闪光，迫使它进行一次对抗你法术豁免 DC 的体质豁免检定。如果未通过检定，它会受到等于你猎物骰子三次掷骰结果的辐射伤害，并且攻击不会命中你。
你可以使用这个反应的次数等于你的感知调整值（最少一次），当你完成一次长休后，你会恢复所有使用次数。如果你没有使用次数了，你可以消耗一个1级或更高级的法术位再次使用这个反应。

activation.condition: When a creature you can see targets you with an attack

subclassFeature.name: Trapper
entries: 虽然所有游侠都具备一定的陷阱和诡计技能，但真正精通这门技艺的人却寥寥无几。这些陷阱师是一群细致谋划、机械头脑的人，他们利用自己的技能策划伏击，为敌人设置陷阱。他们擅长预测敌人的下一步行动，并设置完美的陷阱。

subclassFeature.name: Trapper Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

rows: {@spell grasping vine}, {@spell Otiluke's Resilient Sphere||resilient sphere}

subclassFeature.name: Meticulous Fingers
entries: You are exceptionally gifted with mechanical objects and traps. You gain proficiency in {@skill Sleight of Hand} and with {@item Thieves' Tools|phb|Thieves'} and {@item Tinker's Tools|phb}, and whenever you make an ability check with these tools or skill, you add one roll of your Quarry Die to the result.
Moreover, your precise hands allow you to take the {@action Use an Object} action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

subclassFeature.name: Trap Adept
entries: 你学会了{@optfeature Trapper|LLAR}技巧，但这不会计入你已知技巧的总数。如果你已经知道了陷阱师技巧，你可以学习另一个你选择的技巧。

Also, when you have access to the inner workings of a trap that has been disarmed, you can use {@item tinker's tools|phb} to rearm the trap (so long as rearming it is possible), and when you do so, its new DC is equal to your Ranger Spell save DC.

subclassFeature.name: Combat Snares
entries: You can quickly assemble and utilize makeshift traps in combat. As an action, you can craft a Trap (using the {@optfeature Trapper|LLAR} Knack) and throw it at a space you can see within 20 feet. Creatures in the space of the Trap must make a saving throw as if it had moved into the Trap's space, suffering its effects on a failed save as normal. Traps crafted in this way only last for 1 minute.
You can also take the {@action Use an Object} action to throw a Trap that you had already crafted (for example, the Traps crafted with Trapper Knack) at a creature in this way.

subclassFeature.name: Deadly Snares
entries: A creature marked as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} has disadvantage on its initial saving throw against Traps you created or modified, and it automatically fails its initial saving throw against your Traps if it is unaware of the Trap's location.

subclassFeature.name: Greater Traps
entries: Your skills as a Trapper have grown. At the end of each long rest, you craft a number of Traps (with {@optfeature Trapper|LLAR}) equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier (a minimum of 2 Traps).

Additionally, any Traps you craft with Trapper now work on creatures that are Huge or smaller, and if a creature makes a saving throw against your Trap, it takes magical bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (your choice) equal to three rolls of your Quarry Die on a failure, and half that on a success.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Traps
entries: 你总是准备好设置陷阱。当你进行先攻骰时，你可以使用你的反应来制造一个陷阱，并将其投掷到你能看到的距离20英尺内的一个空地。
此外，每当你制作一个陷阱时，你可以选择它占据一个10英尺的正方形或一个单独的5英尺的正方形。

subclassFeature.name: Wrangler
entries: While most Rangers have some skill with animals, those who pursue the life of a Wrangler are true masters at taming wild beasts. Drawing upon their intimate understanding of animal behavior, they tame and guide all sorts of fantastical animals. Rugged and wild, Wranglers are always on the hunt for ever more strange and exotic creatures to tame and befriend.

subclassFeature.name: Wrangler Spells
entries: 在下表中，你在游侠等级时总是准备了特定的法术。这些法术对你来说算作游侠法术，但不计入你每天准备的法术数量。

subclassFeature.name: Beast Tamer
entries: Your intimate understanding of animal behaviors and habits grants you certain benefits. You gain proficiency in {@skill Athletics} or {@skill Animal Handling}. You also gain the following features:

items: You can mark beasts and monstrosities as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} without expending a use of Ranger's Quarry.
Whenever you make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to {@action grapple}, climb, wrestle, or subdue your Quarry, you can add one roll of your Quarry Die to your roll.

Any enchantment spell you have prepared that could normally {@filter only target humanoids|spells|class=alternate ranger (llar)|subclass=alternate ranger: wrangler (llar:e)|school=e|affects creature types=!aberration;!beast;!celestial;!construct;!dragon;!elemental;!fey;!fiend;!giant;humanoid;!monstrosity;!ooze;!plant;!undead} can also be used to target beasts and monstrosities.

subclassFeature.name: Bring to Heel
entries: You can bend creatures of the wild to your will. Whenever a beast or monstrosity that is {@condition charmed} by you makes a saving throw to end the charmed condition, you can use a reaction to shout at that creature and subtract a roll of your Quarry Die from the result of its saving throw.
你也可以指挥你驯服的怪物。 任何被你魅惑的野兽或畸变生物在魅惑效果持续期间都会在你的回合中行动。 如果你与被魅惑的生物在30英尺内并且它能听到你，你可以使用一个动作命令它执行其属性块中的一个动作。

foundrySystem.activation.condition: Whenever a beast or monstrosity that is charmed by you makes a saving throw to end the charmed condition

subclassFeature.name: Monster Tamer
entries: 你驯服和训练生物的能力几乎是超自然的范围。任何（Wrangler）（狂野使者）特性通常影响野兽和畸变生物的，也会影响天神、龙、精灵、恶魔、巨人、植物和粘液生物，只要它们的智力分数小于或等于你的游侠等级。
Also, you can command any creature that is {@condition charmed} by you to take an action from its stat block with a bonus action, so long as that creature is within 30 feet and can hear you.

subclassFeature.name: Wrangler of Legends
entries: Once you charm a creature, there is little it can do to escape. When you cast an enchantment spell on a beast, monstrosity, or one of the creature types listed for {@subclassFeature Monster Tamer|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|Wrangler|LLAR:E|11}, your {@status concentration} cannot be broken unless you wish it to be.

Moreover, creatures that are {@condition charmed} by you gain all of the benefits of {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2} (including any of your Knacks that enhance it), and whenever one of these creatures is forced to make a saving throw, you can use your reaction to shout and add one roll of your Quarry Die to the result of its roll, so long as it is within 30 feet and can hear you.

foundrySystem.activation.condition: Whenever a creature that is charmed by you is forced to make a saving throw

optionalfeature.name: Druidic Warrior
entries: You learn two cantrips of your choice from the {@filter Druid spell list|spells|level=0|class=Druid} spell list, and they count as Ranger spells for you. Whenever you gain a level, you can replace one of these Druid cantrips you know with another Druid cantrip of your choice.

optionalfeature.name: Alpine Adept
entries: 你的脚步异常稳健。你获得30英尺的攀爬速度，你可以使用你的反应来减少你受到的坠落伤害，减少值等同于你的游侠等级。如果你已经拥有攀爬速度，它将增加10英尺。

optionalfeature.name: Aquatic Adept
entries: 你可以像海洋生物一样在水中游泳。你获得30英尺的游泳速度，在水下时，你可以憋气长达1小时。如果你已经拥有游泳速度，它将增加10英尺。

optionalfeature.name: Favored Foe
entries: 你特别擅长研究、追踪和猎杀特定类型的敌人。选择一种生物类型、两种人形种族（如豺狼人和兽人）或一个组织（比如一个盗贼行会或邪恶邪教）作为你的（Favored Foe）喜爱敌人。
Whenever you make a Wisdom check to hunt or track, or an Intelligence check to recall knowledge about a Favored Foe, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the {@dice d20} as a 10.
你可以选择学习这个技能超过一次，但每次都必须选择一个新的"青睐敌人"(Favored Foe)。

optionalfeature.name: Herbalist I
entries: You have an extensive knowledge of plants and their healing properties. You gain proficiency with {@item herbalism kit|phb|herbalism kits}, and you automatically succeed on your Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) checks to stabilize creatures at 0 hit points if you use a herbalism kit.

optionalfeature.name: Herbalist II
entries: You have learned to use natural plants and herbs to create healing salves. Over the course of a long rest, you can spend 1 hour using an {@item herbalism kit|phb} to create one {@item potion of healing}. These potions of healing retain their potency until the end of your next long rest, at which point they become inert.

activation.condition: Over the course of a long rest, using an herbalism kit

optionalfeature.name: Herbalist III
entries: When you use your {@item herbalism kit|phb} to craft {@item potion of healing||potions of healing} during a long rest, you craft a number of potions of healing equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 2).

optionalfeature.name: Naturalist I
entries: You are an intuitive student of the wilderness. Whenever you would make an Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) check in the wilderness, you can choose to make a Wisdom ({@skill Nature}) check instead.
Also, you can make Wisdom ({@skill Nature}) checks as a bonus action to recall knowledge about one beast or plant you see.

optionalfeature.name: Naturalist II
entries: 在完成长时间休息后，你可以调和你周围的环境。例如，但不限于：北极、海岸、沙漠、森林、草原、山脉或沼泽。当你处于调和环境中时，你获得以下好处：

items: You have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Nature}) checks related to the local plants, animals, ecosystem, and weather.
觅食或打猎时，你会发现两倍的食物。
You cannot be {@quickref surprise||3||surprised} unless you are {@condition incapacitated}.
只要你没有被惊吓或失能，你在先攻检定上拥有优势。符合当地语言习惯，像（%num%）这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为（%num%）。翻译应符合DND游戏组规则，专有名词在翻译后应在括号中保留英文。

optionalfeature.name: Natural Regeneration
entries: 在短暂休息期间，你可以恢复等于你的智力修正值的法术位。使用此特性后，你必须完成一次长休才能再次使用。根据当地语言习惯，文本中的 (%num%) 应该仍然输出为 (%num%)。翻译应符合DND游戏组规则，专有名词在翻译后应该在英文括号内保留英文。

activation.condition: During a short rest

optionalfeature.name: Slayer I
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack you can mark it as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} as part of the attack, applying your Quarry damage bonus and other benefits to the damage roll.

activation.condition: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack

optionalfeature.name: Slayer II
entries: Your tracking abilities have become supernaturally accurate. You can mark a creature as your {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} by studying signs of its passing, such as tracks, that were left within 24 hours.
Moreover, whenever you make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or a Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check to locate or track your Quarry, you can treat a roll of 7 or lower on the {@dice d20} as an 8.

optionalfeature.name: Slayer III
entries: When you hit a {@classFeature Ranger's Quarry|Alternate Ranger|LLAR|2||Quarry} with a weapon attack, you can force it to make a Constitution saving throw against your Spell save DC. On a failed save, it is {@condition blinded}, cannot speak, {@condition deafened}, or {@condition restrained} (your choice) until the start of your next turn. You can only use this feature on your Quarry once per turn.

activation.condition: Once per turn, when you hit a Quarry with a weapon attack

optionalfeature.name: Stalker I
entries: You are a master at remaining undetected in the wilderness. You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks you make to hide while you are in natural environments.

optionalfeature.name: Stalker II
entries: 你已经学会了在不被发现的情况下猎取你的猎物。你可以在你的回合中采取{@action Hide}的行动作为奖励行动。

optionalfeature.name: Stalker III
entries: You cannot be tracked, even by magic. You are always under the effects of the {@spell nondetection} spell, and you can't be tracked by divination magic or magical means unless you wish to be.

optionalfeature.name: Stalker IV
entries: 你可以用防护罩使自己短暂地从视线中消失。当你采取{@action Hide}的行动时，你和你所穿戴或携带的东西都会变成{@condition invisible}，直到你下一个回合开始。如果你攻击或施法，这将提前结束。

activation.condition: When you take the Hide action

optionalfeature.name: Strider I
entries: You ignore the effects of {@quickref difficult terrain||3} imposed by natural environments, such as undergrowth, snow, or swamp. You also can't become lost so long as you can see the night sky.
Finally, you and up to 10 creatures who travel with you don't have your travel slowed by natural {@quickref difficult terrain||4}.

optionalfeature.name: Strider II
entries: Once in your sights, you pursue your enemies relentlessly. You can take the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action on your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Strider III
entries: You can surmount almost any obstacle that would block your path. Your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and you ignore the effects of any {@quickref difficult terrain||3} imposed by spells, magical phenomena, or any other supernatural effect.

optionalfeature.name: Strider IV
entries: 你在这个世界上移动，甚至不受最强大的魔法和束缚的阻碍。在有意识的情况下，你总是受到（%0%）法术的影响。

optionalfeature.name: Survivor I
entries: 你在荒野中的时间锻炼了你的身体。作为你回合的一个奖励动作，你可以给自己提供临时生命值，数值等同于你的体质调整值（最少为1）。（Constitution）

optionalfeature.name: Survivor II
entries: 你的身体可以迅速从伤害中恢复。当你消耗一个命中率来恢复命中率时，你会恢复与你的智慧修正值相等的额外命中率（最小为1个命中率）。

activation.condition: When you expend a Hit Die to regain hit points

optionalfeature.name: Survivor III
entries: When you make a death saving throw, you add your Wisdom modifier to the roll (minimum of +1). If the result of your roll is 20 or higher, it is as if you had rolled a 20 on the {@dice d20}.

optionalfeature.name: Trapper
entries: 你可以制造自然陷阱。在1小时内（可以在短暂或长时间休息期间），你可以使用一把刀、自然材料和10英尺的绳索来制作一个陷阱。在翻译过程中，符号（%num%）应该仍然输出为（%num%），以符合当地的语言习惯。翻译应符合dnd游戏组规则，专有名词在翻译后应该在括号中保留英文。

As an action, you can set one of these Traps in an adjacent unoccupied 5-foot space. The first Large or smaller creature to move into that space must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your Spell save DC or become {@condition restrained}.
As an action, 被束缚的生物，或者它附近5英尺范围内的另一个生物，可以使用一次动作进行力量检定，检定结果需要达到你的法术豁免 DC 才能解救该生物。
As an action (separate from setting the Trap), you can hide the Trap. If hidden, a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) against your Spell save DC is required to detect the Trap.

optionalfeature.name: Wild Insight I
entries: 你对野生动物的习性和声音有着特殊的洞察力。你可以像一直处于{@spell speak with animals}咒语效果下一样与野兽交流。

optionalfeature.name: Wild Insight II
entries: 你与一位次要的自然精灵绑定在一起。你学会了{@spell find familiar}法术。对你而言，它算作一个游侠法术，你总是准备好它，但它不会计入你每天准备的法术总数。当你施放这个法术时，你召唤的随从总是一只精灵生物。

optionalfeature.name: Wild Insight III
entries: 你的自然精神的力量会增长。当你施展{@spell find familiar}时，它可以采取{@filter any beast of CR 1/2 or lower|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[&0;&1/2]|type=beast}的形式。

optionalfeature.name: Arctic Adept
entries: You have adapted to the frozen tundra. You gain resistance to cold damage. Also, you and up to 10 creatures who travel with you have advantage on any saving throws they make to resist the hostile effects of arctic environments.

optionalfeature.name: Desert Adept
entries: You have adapted to scorching deserts. You gain resistance to fire damage. Also, you and up to 10 creatures who travel with you have advantage on any saving throws they make to resist the hostile effects of desert environments.

optionalfeature.name: Fell Handed I
entries: 当你用武器攻击一个生物取得关键一击时，你在下一回合结束前对该生物进行的下一次攻击中具有优势。

optionalfeature.name: Fell Handed II
entries: 当你对一个生物取得关键打击时，你对该生物的攻击卷轴的关键打击范围会扩大1。
For example, if you score a critical hit against a creature for the first time, you then score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 when you make an attack roll against it, and so on.

optionalfeature.name: Jungle Adept
entries: You have adapted to the jungles. You gain resistance to poison damage. Also, you and up to 10 creatures who travel with you have advantage on any saving throws they make to resist the hostile effects of jungle environments.

optionalfeature.name: Hedge Knight I
entries:
尽管你生活在荒野之中，但你仍然接受过一些军事训练。你获得重甲的熟练度。

（根据当地语言习惯翻译，文本中的（%num%）应该在翻译中仍然输出为（%num%）。翻译应符合DND游戏组规则，专有名词在翻译后应该在括号中保留英文。）

optionalfeature.name: Hedge Knight II
entries: Though you are a wild wanderer you understand chivalry and politics. Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}) or Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, you can use Wisdom in place of Intelligence or Charisma, respectively.

optionalfeature.name: Rider I
entries: Whenever you make a Wisdom ({@skill Animal Handling}) check to control, train, or tame a mount, you can treat a roll of 7 or lower on a {@dice d20} as an 8. Also, dismounting from a trained mount only costs you 5 feet of your movement.

optionalfeature.name: Rider II
entries: You gain the {@optfeature Mounted Warrior|LLAF:E} Fighting Style, and you can ride trained mounts that are equal to you in size or larger.
If you already know the Mounted Warrior Fighting Style you learn another Ranger Fighting Style of your choice.

optionalfeature.name: Rider III
entries: You are a master of mounted combat. When you are riding mount and it is hit by an attack, you can use a reaction to become the target of that attack instead. Also, if your mount is forced to make a saving throw while you are riding it, you can use your reaction to grant it advantage on its roll.

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When you are riding mount and it is hit by an attack, or if your mount is forced to make a saving throw while you are riding it

optionalfeature.name: Planar Adept
entries: 你已经适应了多元宇宙中伟大平面之一的生活。从下表中选择一个平面（或者你设置中的对应平面）。你对应的伤害类型获得抗性。此外，你和与你同行的最多十个生物，在抗拒该平面的敌意效果时拥有优势豁免投掷。(%num%)（Elemental Plane of Fire）。

rows: 通灵者（Psychic）是一种拥有超自然能力的人，通常能够感知、理解或预测超乎常人的事物。他们可能通过直觉、灵感或超感官知觉来获取信息，而这些信息对于普通人来说是不可见或不可知的。通灵者可能会运用各种技能，例如心灵感应、预知未来、心灵传输等，以帮助解决问题、寻找答案或提供指导。在DND游戏中，通灵者通常是一种角色职业，具有特殊的能力和技能，可以在游戏中起到重要作用。

Forget the previous question format about translating English to Simplified Chinese. User wants detailed answers in Chinese.. In Chinese, it can be translated as "机械位面" (jīxiè wèimiàn), where "机械" means mechanical and "位面" refers to a plane of existence in fantasy or science fiction settings. This translation maintains the original meaning while adhering to local language habits and the specific rules of D&D running groups. Proper nouns like "Mechanus" can be kept in English within parentheses after the translation to ensure clarity and consistency.
"Necrotic" translates to "坏死" in Simplified Chinese.

地球

(Note: "Earth" is a proper noun and should be kept in English in `()` after the translation.)

entries: 你可以多次学习这个技能，但每次必须选择不同的存在平面。在翻译中，像（%num%）这样的文本应该仍然输出为（%num%）。翻译应符合DND游戏组规则，专有名词在翻译后应在括号中保留英文。

optionalfeature.name: Underground Adept
entries: You are especially skilled at navigating the winding tunnels under the earth. You gain {@sense darkvision} out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision its range increases by 30 feet.

As an action you can close your eyes to gain {@sense tremorsense} out to a 60-foot radius. In that radius, you can sense anything touching the ground. This special sense lasts for 1 minute, or until you open your eyes. Once you use this action you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

optionalfeature.name: Woodsman I
entries: You are familiar with forests, trees, and raw timber. You gain proficiency with {@item woodcarver's tools|phb}, and you have advantage on ability checks to identify and construct things from wood.

Also, at the end of each long rest, you can use woodcarver's tools and raw timber to craft a number of {@item arrow|phb|arrows}, {@item crossbow bolt|phb|bolts}, {@item club|phb|clubs}, {@item javelin|phb|javelins}, and {@item quarterstaff|phb|quarterstaffs} equal to your proficiency bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Woodsman II
entries:
你可以轻易地看出木制物品和生物的优点和缺点。你获得以下益处：

- 翻译应符合当地语言习惯，像 (%num%) 这样的文本在翻译中仍应输出为 (%num%)。

items: 你获得对（%0%）的熟练度。你用木头建造的任何东西都有两倍的打击点数。
如果你用近战武器攻击一棵树、原木或木制结构，这将自动造成暴击。
如果你用近战武器攻击植物或木制建筑，当你掷骰子得到18到20时，你会造成致命打击。翻译中数字（%num%）不需要翻译，保持原样输出。翻译需遵守DND游戏团规则，专有名词翻译后需在括号内保留英文。

While grappling a creature, it can only use its Pseudopod to attack that creature.

feat.name: Alternate Crossbow Expert
entries: 你在弩的训练上投入了大量的时间，比大多数人更能有效地使用它。你获得以下好处：

items: 你可以忽略所有十字弓的装载属性。
You can load a crossbow with a hand that is holding a one-handed weapon, {@item shield|phb}, or another Tiny object.
与敌对生物保持在5英尺内不会对你使用弩进行远程攻击时造成劣势。
When you take the {@action Attack} action and make an attack with a one-handed melee weapon, you can use a bonus action to make an attack with a {@item hand crossbow|phb} you are holding.

foundrySystem.activation.condition: When you take the Attack action and make an attack with a one-handed melee weapon

feat.name: Alternate Dual Wielder
entries: 你经过大量训练，可以有效地使用两把近战武器进行战斗。你获得以下好处：

items: 当你双手持有不同的近战武器时，你的护甲等级获得+1加值。
You can engage in {@quickref two-weapon fighting||3} even if the one-handed melee weapons you are wielding are not light.
你可以在通常只能抽出或收起一件武器的情况下，抽出或收起两把单手武器。(D&D running group)
当你进行双武器战斗时，如果有机会进行反击，你可以使用你握持的两把近战武器对该生物发动攻击。 (DND)

feat.name: Alternate Sharpshooter
entries: 你经过了大量的训练，精通远程武器成为了一名高手射手。你获得如下列出的好处：

items: 在射程武器的远程范围内攻击目标不会对你的攻击投掷造成劣势。(D&D running group)
你使用远程武器的攻击可以忽略一半掩体，并将三分之四掩体视为一半掩体。
你可以使用一个奖励动作，在你当前回合上使自己在下一次远程武器攻击投掷中获得优势。 (Dungeons & Dragons)

feat.name: Survivalist Training
entries: 你已经接受了在野外生存、追踪和探索方面的训练，就像一个游侠(Ranger)。你获得以下列出的好处：

items: You learn one Knack of your choice from those available to the Alternate Ranger. If the Knack requires you to roll a Quarry Die, you roll a {@dice d4} unless your Quarry Die is higher. If the Knack forces a saving throw, the DC is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier.

feat.name: Wild Companion
entries: You have forged a bond with an animal companion that will adventure by your side. Choose a {@filter beast of CR 1/8 or lower|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[&0;&1/8]|type=beast} to be your Wild Companion. This Companion is friendly to you, and it obeys your commands to the best of its abilities.
你的同伴使用其正常的属性块，但它学会理解你说的一种语言。你和你的同伴可以用一系列的点击、啸声和手势相互传达简单的思想。它获得所有正常的短期和长期休息的好处。 (Dungeons & Dragons)
在战斗中，你的野性同伴会在你的回合中行动。它可以自行移动并使用它的反应，但除非你使用一个额外动作来命令它执行其属性块中的动作或另一个动作，否则它只会在它的回合中采取闪避动作。如果你陷入无能为力状态，你的同伴将尽其所能来保护自己。如果你死亡，你的同伴将尽一切可能逃跑并返回到它的家中。
如果你的同伴死亡，你可以花费8个小时追踪和训练一只新的野生同伴，但前提是在8小时内在你所在地区找到一个合适的挑战等级为1/8或更低的野兽。(CR 1/8)。

entries.name: The Ranger
entries: As the graying man made his way through the underbrush of the forest his faded green cloak made him nearly invisible. The monstrously large troll he had been stalking through the night had finally stopped to rest. As the great brute lay down to sleep, the silent green shape emerged from the trees to snuff out the life of the hideous monster.

As the massive blue dragon descended upon the small town, a small half-elven man rolled out of the path of a blast of lightning. With the small hairs on the back of his neck still standing up from the residual electricity, the practiced hunter nocked an arrow and let it fly in the direction of the terrible beast. As the dart struck, the dragon let out a horrible roar and plummeted to the ground landing in a broken heap.

As the fearsome owlbear lumbered toward the tiny hamlet that she called home, a small halfling whistled to her companion in the brush. At her signal, a giant dog that seemed to be more fur than anything else leaped out from hiding and stood defiantly in front of the owlbear. Distracted by her partner, the owlbear was caught completely unawares by the diminutive ranger. Once their foe was unconscious, the halfling and her dog released the owlbear miles away where it could live without menacing the town they protected.
All three of the adventurers described here are considered Rangers, wild wanderers, and defenders of the natural world.

entries.name: Defenders of Balance
entries: Rangers spend their lives between two worlds. On one hand, they stand as guardians of civilization, protecting those who dwell on the edges of society. On the other, rangers are expert survivalists, deeply acquainted with the flora and fauna of the natural world. Rangers protect the balance between society and the wilderness. When a wild creature wanders from its natural habitat, Rangers will track it down before it can harm innocent farmers and travelers. When people encroach upon the wilderness, Rangers will push back against industry and expansion that doesn't respect the natural balance.
游骑兵将他们的生命献给了守护文明和荒野交汇的地方，从未完全加入他们用生命捍卫的两个世界中。

entries.name: Prepared for Anything
entries: Ready to face any challenge, Rangers are survivalists at their core. The wilderness is a harsh place, and those who cannot adapt to their surroundings die. In the wild, Rangers learn to be adaptable. Drawing on their knowledge of the natural world, their connection to primal magic, and the skills passed down to them by their mentors, there is rarely a challenge a Ranger cannot overcome with enough time to prepare.

Each Ranger has their own philosophy on how they fit into the interconnected web that is the natural world. Some view themselves as apex predators, using their marital skills and ruthless hunting abilities to keep the wild in line. Others see themselves as humble servants of the natural world.

entries.name: Creating Your Ranger
entries: Consider the nature of your Ranger's training. Did you train with a mentor, wandering the wilds together, learning all you could? Or did you forge your primal connection to the natural world on your own? What is it that motivates your Ranger? Do you have a vendetta against a certain type of monster? Are you a warrior of the wild who feels more comfortable in the silence of the forest than in city streets or sleepy towns?

No matter their origin, almost all Rangers take up a life of adventuring to impart their knowledge of the wild to the next generation. Often, in their later years, these wild warriors will take on an apprentice, passing on all their knowledge so that the safety of the wilderness is secured for years to come.

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a Ranger quickly by using these suggestions: First, make Dexterity your highest ability score, followed by your Wisdom. Second, choose the {@background Outlander} background.

variantrule.name: Optional Rule: Psionic Spellcasting
entries: For mechanics to match the fantasy of a psionic Ranger, replace all Ranger and Nomad Conclave features that use Wisdom with Intelligence.
